assertions.name: Author quality
assertions.value: SELECT * FROM {{schema}}.top_articles_by_author WHERE Author like \'Jeff Hollan\'

assertions.name: Author - no dupes
assertions.value: SELECT AUTHOR FROM {{schema}}.top_articles_by_author GROUP BY AUTHOR HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

assertions.name: Author - no nulls
assertions.value: SELECT AUTHOR FROM {{schema}}.top_articles_by_author WHERE AUTHOR is null

assertions.name: Reading - minmax norm
assertions.value: SELECT READING_TIME FROM {{schema}}.top_articles_by_author WHERE READING_TIME > 1 OR READING_TIME < 0

assertions.name: Claps - minmax norm
assertions.value: SELECT CLAPS FROM {{schema}}.top_articles_by_author WHERE CLAPS > 1 OR CLAPS < 0
